Title: Authorizes the Merrick Hook & Ladder Co. 1 fire company recieve retroactive real property tax exempt status
Summary: Authorizes the Merrick Hook & Ladder Co. 1 fire company receive retroactive real property tax exempt status for the property located at 1893 Oakwood Ave, hamlet of Merrick, town of Hempstead, county of Nassau.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing the Merrick Hook & Ladder Co. 1 receive retroactive real property tax exempt status
